name: Run Jump Fall
description:
Run Jump Fall is a game developed for the "ScoreSpace Jam #22" in 3 Days. It's a infinite parkour game, with an online leaderboard competition. The map is made of towers that start to tip over once you land on them.

This game was created under the theme "FALLING"

Note: The game runs much better when it's downloaded and run, Web game might lag

Credits:

Skybox: Unity Asset

Leaderboard: LootLocker

Font: Dosis

Sound: Unity Asset and Bfxr
